alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:25AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Osage County through 600 AM CDT... At 525 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Elgin to 3 miles northeast of Burbank. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Shidler... Burbank... Elgin... Grainola... Foraker... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Sunset Lake... Eastern Kaw Lake... Webb City... Wah Sha She State Park... Apperson... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
